term.title: volumic

item.text: Attribute to a physical quantity obtained by division by volume. Charge density may thus be called volumic charge which is the electric charge in a section of space divided by the volume of that section.

sources.item: PAC, 1985, 57, 1299. 'Review of plasma deposition applications: preparation of optical waveguides' on page 1310 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac198557091299)
PAC, 1996, 68, 957. 'Glossary of terms in quantities and units in Clinical Chemistry (IUPAC-IFCC Recommendations 1996)' on page 999 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199668040957)

Users of these terms are encouraged to include the version of a term with its use and to check regularly for updates to term definitions that you are using.
